com.betfair.cougar.core.api.ev

Class WaitingObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betfair.cougar.core.api.ev.WaitingObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionObserver

    public class WaitingObserver
extends Object
implements ExecutionObserver
    This class provides a synchronous observer that'll wait for a result. Useful for providing a synchronous adapter around an async service.

      • getExecutionResult

      • await

        public boolean await(long timeoutInMillis)
              throws InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        timeoutInMillis - - specifies time to wait in milli seconds for this operation to complete. If the value is <= 0, it will wait indefinitely.
        Returns:
        returns true if a result was received, false if it timed out
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the waiting call was interrupted
